post_content:
Long time lurker/first time poster….
My eBay seller name is jemwiz00 (100% feedback)

I’ve  been (slowly) putting together a mini set of Piedmont 150 Highlanders.

I’m mostly looking for poor to fair condition raw cards although I would consider low grade slabs if the price was right. 

Thank you for reading ! ⚾️

Addendum: I already have Chase White Hat, Ball, Manning, Lake and Chesbro
